idea:
Sise Events & Media LLP Website

Sise Events and Media LLP is an Events and Media startup founded recently in January 2020 itself.

Sise Events and Media offers a host of services like Celebrity Management, Movie Promotions, Corporate Events, Photography and Video Production, Social Media Management,Celebrity Endorsements,Influencer Marketing among others.


You can also check us out on Instagram at www.instagram.com/siseindia


To give you a bit of background about our agency, Sise Events and Media LLP provides services like Influencer Marketing, Movie Promotions, Corporate Events, Social Media Management ,Talent & Celebrity Management/PR among others to its valuable clients. Our company was incorporated in 2020 itself and has already been associated with big movies from the industry like Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan, Jawaani Jaaneman, Love Aajkal, Guns of Banaras for their promotional campaigns. We have also worked with T Series in promoting their Singles -Yaad piya ki aane lagi for Divya Khosla Kumar.

Sise Events & Media LLP has been associated with different celebrities for interactive sessions on digital platforms such as Daisy Shah, Muddassar Khan, Feroz Khan, Caeser Gonsalvees, Kunwar Amar, Ritvik Sahore.
name: Sise Events & Media LLP

idea:
EUTONIX LLP is a fuel start-up, with the aim to focus on Mobile Fuel dispensing solutions, having its registered office in Mumbai. Eutonix LLP is majorly owned women enterprise having aspirations to expand operations in across India. We will deliver fuels directly at your doorstep, saving your precious time that otherwise would have been wasted on roads in travelling to fuel station for filling up diesel.

Our trained staff and drivers will ensure timely delivery of quality fuels from reputed OMC's being delivered to you without any adulteration.
name: EUTONIX LLP

idea: NAIK Green Energy Pvt. Ltd. is established in 2015 with a patented technology of wave energy converter. We are the sole Developer and Designer of Offshore Oscillating Water Column Energy Converter with the invented method of Wave Surface Level Amplification, which is unknown to the world till date. This amplification method gives maximum efficiency to above 95% in comparison to other existing power converters; which have efficiency near 50%. This unique technology could lead us as a Master Player in the Global market of wave energy. We have successfully tested the laboratory module of this technology and now handy with the latest design for “Install and Forget” with long service life and negligible maintenance.
name: NAIK GREEN ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED
